value.name: Neighbour gets embarrassing note asking him to ‘keep the noise down’ during ‘intimate moments’
value.description: Seriously – can you imagine anything more awkward? Stephen Cunningham, 28, from Glasgow found the handwritten letter slid under his door, which begged him to “keep the noise down at night”.
